title.english: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description:
After inheriting his late grandmother’s failing café, Hayato sees it as a bother and plans to sell it for a quick buck. Until he discovers five beautiful girls staying there! When they beg him to keep the café open, Hayato reluctantly gives in. Can he manage the seaside shop while learning to live with these unruly women?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: คาเฟ่นี้มีนางฟ้ามาเสิร์ฟ

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Restaurant
tags.description: Features a business that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers. Also encompasses cafes and bistros.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

title.native: 女神のカフェテラス 第2期

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/seokouji)

Seo Kouji is a Japanese manga creator from Shobara, Hiroshima, Japan. He has stated in an interview that he was a member of his high school's track and field team and that he loves to watch baseball both emphasized in his hit manga Suzuka. He debuted in 1996 with the one-shot "Half & Half" in Fresh magazine. His two hits, Suzuka and Cross Over, both mixed the genres of sports with high school romance. Suzuka focused on track and field while Cross Over used basketball. It is also interesting to note that the main love interest of the male protagonists of several of his works are extremely similar in appearance, namely in Half and Half, Cross Over, Suzuka, and Kimi No Iru Machi. Seo was an assistant to Oushima Tsukasa, and studied under Fujio Fujiko and Soda Masahito.  In 2009 Seo designed the High School Girl Kimchi for Hokubi Construction food company.
He is a member of Writers Guild of Japan.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Chom2Start)  |  [SOUL OF JOE (fansite)](http://soulofjoe.jp/index.html)

Currently working for Studio M2.

He's an Ashita no Joe ''collector'' and fan and has contributed to books, TV programs, museums and more. He is also an administrator of the fansite ''SOUL OF JOE''.

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.
He is a member of Writers Guild of Japan.

title.native: ぼくたちは勉強ができない
私の百合はお仕事です！
冴えない彼女の育てかた
俺の妹がこんなに可愛いわけがない
